name: sfchronicle
text:
JUST IN: Students in Oakland will begin the school year on August 10, with at least four weeks of distance learning before phasing into blended learning that will include in-classroom instruction, district officials said.

https://t.co/Yx5BZGxb4e

name: sfchronicle
text:

name: sfchronicle
text: The recent surge of coronavirus infections in California is driving up demand for testing and triggering a resurgence in delays, forcing many people to wait up to a week. Have you been tested recently? https://t.co/cUQcwzOrRe

name: sfchronicle
text: The policy, dubbed BerkDOT, aims to decriminalize minor traffic violations that disproportionately impact Black and brown people by creating a new Berkeley Department of Transportation. https://t.co/FKfO0jSapP
